TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit EditorPartCollection extends System.Collections.ReadOnlyCollectionBase
Public NotInheritable Class EditorPartCollection Inherits ReadOnlyCollectionBase

summary.span: 包含 控制項的集合，用來編輯 控制項的屬性、配置、外觀和行為。

span.span: Contains a collection of controls used for editing the properties, layout, appearance, and behavior of controls.
This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別是唯讀的集合控制項，通常由來追蹤一組區域區域所包含的控制項。The class is a read-only collection of controls, typically used by an zone to track the set of controls contained by the zone. 當 Web 組件頁面進入編輯模式，並在使用者選取要編輯的控制項時，便會開始編輯程序。When a Web Parts page enters edit mode, and a user selects a control to edit, the editing process begins. 建立新的區域物件，內含區域所包含的控制項。The zone creates a new object consisting of the controls contained by the zone. 在編輯程序中的各個階段，在該區域會存取物件，以儲存或擷取屬性值之間集合中的控制項和控制項目前正在編輯。At various phases in the editing process, the zone accesses the object to save or retrieve property values between the controls in the collection and the control currently being edited. 您可以建立如果您需要執行一組的某些大量作業，例如您自己以程式設計方式使用的控制項集合控制項。You can create an collection of controls for your own programmatic use if, for example, you need to perform some mass operation on a set of controls. 即使物件是唯讀的您可以透過程式設計方式變更基礎集合中所參考的控制項的屬性。Even though the object is read-only, you can make programmatic changes to the properties of the underlying controls referenced in the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範了多個類別。The following code example demonstrates several uses of the class. 有四個部分，此程式碼範例：There are four parts to this code example: - 使用者控制項，可讓您變更 Web 組件頁面上的顯示模式。A user control that enables you to change display modes on a Web Parts page. - 自訂類別控制項，名為`TextDisplayWebPart`，這在網頁中參考，和編輯程式控制項。A class for a custom control named `TextDisplayWebPart`, which is referenced in the Web page and is edited by the controls. - 參考的網頁`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項，包含控制項的數個控制從在區域中，設定宣告的 Web 組件控制項，並包含一些事件驅動的程式碼，來建立及操作物件。A Web page that references the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, contains an control with several of the controls from the Web Parts control set declared in the zone, and contains some event-driven code to create and manipulate an object. - 當您載入瀏覽器中，程式碼範例的運作方式的說明。An explanation of how the code example works when you load it in a browser. 此程式碼範例的第一個部分是可讓使用者變更顯示模式，在網頁上的使用者控制項。The first part of this code example is the user control that enables users to change display modes on a Web page. For 詳細資料會顯示在此控制項模式和原始碼的描述，請參閱[逐步解說：變更顯示模式，在 Web 組件頁面](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0)。For details about display modes and a description of the source code in this control, see [Walkthrough: Changing Display Modes on a Web Parts Page](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/24e42f74-82dc-4c13-8574-130398985fc0). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/CS/displaymodecs.ascx#4)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/VB/displaymodevb.ascx#4)] 在程式碼範例的第二個部分是`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項。The second part of the code example is the `TextDisplayWebPart` control. 若要執行程式碼範例，您必須編譯這個原始程式碼。For the code example to run, you must compile this source code. 您可以明確編譯它，然後將產生的組件放在您的網站的 Bin 資料夾或全域組件快取。You can compile it explicitly and put the resulting assembly in your Web site's Bin folder or the global assembly cache. 或者，您可以將原始程式碼放在您網站的 App_Code 資料夾中，這樣就會在執行階段進行動態編譯。Alternatively, you can put the source code in your site's App_Code folder, where it will be dynamically compiled at run time. 如需示範這兩種編譯方法的逐步解說，請參閱[逐步解說：開發和使用自訂 Web 伺服器控制項](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08)。For a walkthrough that demonstrates both methods of compiling, see [Walkthrough: Developing and Using a Custom Web Server Control](https://msdn.microsoft.com/library/6d90782a-a1a4-45a6-b2d4-cf6362b83b08). 請注意，控制項的屬性，名為`ContentText`; 這個屬性會保留使用者在文字方塊中輸入的值。Note that the control has a property named `ContentText`; this property holds the value that the user enters in the text box. 當控制項處於編輯模式，以及標準時，就可以編輯這個自訂屬性控制屬性。This custom property can be edited when the control is in edit mode, along with the standard control properties. [!code-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/CS/textdisplaywebpart.cs#3)] [!code-vb[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/VB/textdisplaywebpart.vb#3)] 在程式碼範例的第三個部分是網頁。The third part of the code example is the Web page. 請注意，``頁面的項目包含三個宣告控制項。Notice that the `` element for the page contains declarations for three controls. 這些控制項的兩個會成為自訂的一部分時，會建立的物件`Button1_Click`方法執行。Two of these controls become part of a custom object that is created when the `Button1_Click` method executes. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/CS/editorpartcollectioncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/VB/editorpartcollectionvb.aspx#1)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以藉由選取進入編輯模式切換頁面**編輯**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項。When you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into edit mode by selecting **Edit** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 您可以按一下標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號）`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項，然後按一下**編輯**編輯控制項。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 編輯使用者介面 (UI) 可見時，您可以看到所有控制項。When the editing user interface (UI) is visible, you can see all the controls. 您按一下**建立 EditorPartCollection** 按鈕，查看影響所建立的程式碼會操作控制項物件。You click the **Create EditorPartCollection** button to see the effects on the controls that are created by the code that is manipulating the object. 此外，請注意，控制項可讓您編輯自訂`TextDisplayWebPart.ContentText`屬性。Also, notice that the control allows you to edit the custom `TextDisplayWebPart.ContentText` property. 這可能是因為屬性標記著`WebBrowsable`原始程式碼控制項中的屬性。This is possible because the property is marked with a `WebBrowsable` attribute in the source code for the control. 如果您更新編輯 UI 中的屬性值時，您必須讓頁面返回標準瀏覽模式，以查看更新的效果`TextDisplayWebPart.ContentText`屬性。If you update the property value in the editing UI, you must return the page to normal browse mode to see the effect of updating the `TextDisplayWebPart.ContentText` property.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別新的空執行個體。

span.span: Initializes an empty new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式初始化的空執行個體類別。The constructor initializes an empty instance of the class. 這個多載的建構函式會在內部使用類別在其方法來建立空的集合物件。This overload of the constructor is used internally by the class in its method to create an empty collection object. 區域再建立的所有執行個體控制項在子區域樣板中，宣告和使用的內部方法，將它們加入至集合。The zone then creates instances of all the controls declared in the child zone template, and uses an internal method to add them to the collection. 您無法使用的這個多載建構函式建立的新執行個體，並新增給它的控制項。You cannot use this overload of the constructor to create a new instance of and add controls to it. 您必須使用其中一個其他多載的建構函式改用。You must use one of the other overloads for the constructor instead.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(class System.Collections.ICollection editorParts) cil managed

span.span: An of controls.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體，方法是傳入 控制項的 集合。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by passing in an collection of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 建構函式初始化的執行個體類別，並傳入的集合控制項。The constructor initializes an instance of the class and passes in a collection of controls. 這是一個多載可用來建立新的建構函式物件，並將給它的控制項。This is one overload of the constructor that you can use to create a new object and add controls to it. 即使建構函式所建立的執行個體是唯讀的您仍然可以存取個別以程式設計方式控制集合中，並呼叫其屬性和方法。Even though the instance created by the constructor is read-only, you can still access the individual controls in the collection programmatically and call their properties and methods. 一個常見的使用案例建構函式就是如果您想要執行整組某些批次作業控制項，例如變更內容、 外觀或相關的群組，其中的位置。One common scenario for using the constructor would be if you want to perform some batch operation on an entire set of controls, such as changing the content, appearance, or position of a related group of them. 另一個常見的使用案例建構函式正在開發自訂，讓使用者可以編輯您的控制項上的自訂屬性，您想要的伺服器控制項相關聯的控制項。Another common scenario for using the constructor is developing custom controls that you want to associate with a server control, so that users can edit custom properties on your control. 在此案例中，您的伺服器控制項必須實作介面，並為該工作的一部分，它必須實作方法。In this scenario, your server control must implement the interface, and as part of that task, it must implement the method. 在該方法中，若要啟用自訂控制項，以編輯您的伺服器控制項，您必須加入控制項，成為執行個體，例如物件。In that method, to enable the custom controls to edit your server control, you must add the controls to an instance, such as an object. 然後您可以將傳遞的集合控制項新增至來建立新的建構函式物件，其中區域會使用設定的所有控制項，並開始編輯程序。Then you can pass the collection of controls to the constructor to create a new object, which the zone uses to set up all the controls and begin the editing process. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何建立自訂此外，即使集合是唯讀的仍執行批次作業，若要變更個別集合中的控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to create a custom and, even though the collection is read-only, still perform a batch operation to change the individual controls in the collection. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 中的程式碼`Button1_Click`事件會建立物件，請加入兩個三控制物件，頁面中，並接著建立新物件使用建構函式。The code in the `Button1_Click` event creates an object, adds two of the three controls in the page to the object, and then creates a new object using the constructor. 它也會示範如何進行變更，以及在基礎控制項，即使集合是唯讀的。It also demonstrates how you can make changes to the underlying controls, even though the collection is read-only. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/CS/editorpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/VB/editorpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 您可以在瀏覽器頁面載入，並切換至編輯模式的頁面，選取**編輯**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項。You can load the page in a browser and switch the page into edit mode by selecting **Edit** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 您可以按一下標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號）`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項，然後按一下**編輯**編輯控制項。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 編輯使用者介面 (UI) 可見時，您可以看到所有控制項。When the editing user interface (UI) is visible, you can see all the controls. 您按一下**建立 EditorPartCollection** 按鈕，查看兩個效果控制項新增至物件。You click the **Create EditorPartCollection** button to see the effects on the two controls that are added to the object.

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class by passing in an collection of controls, and an collection of additional controls.
ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool Contains(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart editorPart) cil managed

param.name: editorPart
param.span: 正對其集合成員狀態進行測試的 。

span.span: The being tested for its status as a member of the collection.

summary.span: 傳回值，指出集合中是否存在特定的控制項。

span.span: Returns a value that indicates whether a particular control is in the collection.

returns.span: 指出集合中是否存在 的布林值。

span.span: A Boolean value that indicates whether the is in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會判斷是否特定控制已經物件。The method determines whether a specific control is already in the object. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何判斷是否特定控制項處於物件。The following code example demonstrates how to determine whether a particular control is in an object. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 中的程式碼`Button1_Click`事件不會加入`LayoutEditorPart1`若要控制物件時它會新增其他控制項。The code in the `Button1_Click` event does not add the `LayoutEditorPart1` control to the object when it adds the other controls. 若要確認`LayoutEditorPart1`控制項不在集合中，程式碼會使用方法。To confirm that the `LayoutEditorPart1` control is not in the collection, the code uses the method. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/CS/editorpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/VB/editorpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以藉由選取進入編輯模式切換頁面**編輯**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項。When you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into edit mode by selecting **Edit** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 您可以按一下標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號）`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項，然後按一下**編輯**編輯控制項。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 編輯使用者介面 (UI) 可見時，您可以看到所有控制項。When the editing user interface (UI) is visible, you can see the all the controls. 如果您按一下**建立 EditorPartCollection** 按鈕，您會注意到的背景色彩`LayoutEditorPart1`控制項是不同於其他控制項，因為它不屬於物件。If you click the **Create EditorPartCollection** button, you will notice that the background color of the `LayoutEditorPart1` control is different from the other controls, because it is not part of the object.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: public void CopyTo (System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart[] array, int index);
.method public hidebysig instance void CopyTo(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart[] array, int32 index) cil managed
Public Sub CopyTo (array As EditorPart(), index As Integer)
public: void CopyTo(cli::array <System::Web::UI::WebControls::WebParts::EditorPart ^> ^ array, int index);

param.name: array
param.span: 要包含控制項之複製集合的 。

span.span: An to contain the copied collection of controls.

param.name: index
param.span: 放置集合內容的陣列起點。

span.span: The starting point in the array at which to place the collection contents.

summary.span: 複製集合至 控制項的陣列。

span.span: Copies the collection to an array of controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會很有用，當您想要建立自訂的陣列，可以包含中的控制項物件，這些控制項的子集或這些控制項的超集。The method is useful when you want to create a custom array that can contain the controls in the object, a subset of those controls, or a superset of those controls. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法用來建立的自訂陣列控制項。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to create a custom array of controls. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 中的程式碼`Button1_Click`事件建立的陣列控制項，將`LayoutEditorPart1`控制項的陣列，然後再使用方法，將複製從控制項物件陣列。The code in the `Button1_Click` event creates an array of controls, adds the `LayoutEditorPart1` control to the array, and then uses the method to copy the controls from the object to the array. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/CS/editorpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/VB/editorpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以藉由選取進入編輯模式切換頁面**編輯**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項。When you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into edit mode by selecting **Edit** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 您可以按一下標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號）`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項，然後按一下**編輯**編輯控制項。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 編輯使用者介面 (UI) 可見時，您可以看到所有控制項。When the editing user interface (UI) is visible, you can see all the controls. 如果您按一下**建立 EditorPartCollection** 按鈕，您會發現頁面底部附近，會列出自訂的陣列中的所有控制項的標題。If you click the **Create EditorPartCollection** button, you will notice that the titles of all the controls in the custom array are listed near the bottom of the page.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Empty As EditorPartCollection

summary.span: 參考集合的靜態、唯讀和空執行個體。

span.span: References a static, read-only, empty instance of the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 靜態、 唯讀、 空白執行個體降低記憶體使用量，萬一您想要從方法傳回適當的物件類型，或比較的執行個體與另一個物件，空集合執行個體，但是您不需要將成員新增至執行個體。A static, read-only, empty instance of reduces memory usage in cases where you want an empty collection instance to return the proper object type from a method or to compare the instance with another object, but you do not need to add members to the instance.

span.span: ASP.NET Web Parts Controls

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance int32 IndexOf(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.WebParts.EditorPart editorPart) cil managed

span.span: An that is a member of the collection.

summary.span: 傳回集合特定成員的位置。

span.span: Returns the position of a particular member of the collection.

returns.span: 對應於集合中 控制項之索引的整數。

span.span: An integer that corresponds to the index of an control in the collection.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會很有用，如果您有多個控制項在 Web 組件頁面，然後您要在集合中找出特定的控制項。The method is useful if you have multiple controls on a Web Parts page, and you need to locate a particular control in the collection. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用方法來找出控制中物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method to locate an control in an object. 完整的程式碼才能執行範例時，請參閱 < 範例 > 一節的類別概觀。For the full code required to run the example, see the Example section of the class overview. 中的程式碼`Button1_Click`事件會建立物件，然後使用方法來找出`PropertyGridEditorPart1`控制項在集合中，並將其屬性。The code in the `Button1_Click` event creates an object, and then uses the method to locate the `PropertyGridEditorPart1` control in the collection, and set its property. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/CS/editorpartcollectioncs.aspx#2)] [!code-aspx-vb[WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_EditorPartCollection_Overview/VB/editorpartcollectionvb.aspx#2)] 當您載入瀏覽器中的時，您可以藉由選取進入編輯模式切換頁面**編輯**中**顯示模式**下拉式清單控制項。When you load the page in a browser, you can switch the page into edit mode by selecting **Edit** in the **Display Mode** drop-down list control. 您可以按一下標題列中的動詞命令功能表 （向下箭號）`TextDisplayWebPart`控制項，然後按一下**編輯**編輯控制項。You can click the verbs menu (the downward arrow) in the title bar of the `TextDisplayWebPart` control, and click **Edit** to edit the control. 編輯使用者介面 (UI) 可見時，您可以看到所有控制項。When the editing user interface (UI) is visible, you can see all the controls. 如果您按一下**建立 EditorPartCollection** 按鈕，您會發現，`PropertyGridEditorPart1`控制項，也就是頁面底部附近，有標題，但沒有框線。If you click the **Create EditorPartCollection** button, you will notice that the `PropertyGridEditorPart1` control, which is near the bottom of the page, has a title but no border.

param.name: index

summary.span: 根據唯一識別項，傳回集合的特定成員。

span.span: Returns a specific member of the collection according to a unique identifier.

value.span: 位在集合中指定索引處的 。

span.span: An at the specified index in the collection.
